title: Dark.Souls.II.Crown.of.the.Sunken.King-CODEX
description:
CODEX PRESENTS

Dark Souls II: Crown of the Sunken King

Release Date : 7/2014 Protection : Steam
Discs : 1 Genre : RPG

Embark on a journey to reclaim a crown that Drangleic's King Vendrick
once owned. This perilous quest will lead you through an entirely
different world within the Dark Souls IIT universe, where stepped
pyramids span a vast underground cavern. It is said that one of the
ancient crowns lay buried deep within these dark caverns but surely
such a valued item cannot sit unguarded. Explore in search of a crown
that holds the strength of lords from times long past

- Burn or mount the .iso
- Run setup.exe and install
- copy crack from CODEX dir to installdir
- Play

Notes: As the game files completely updated, we've decided to make this
release a standalone, which includes newest DLC, pre-order DLCs
and the main game updated to 1.04 version

Savegames from RELOADED main release are compatible.

Block game exe in your firewall to prevent the game from trying to go
online
